articles.title: "True Detective: Night Country" Reviews Are In - Dark Horizons
articles.description: The reviews for HBO’s “True Detective: Night Country” are in and critics-wise, the series is pulling in the best reviews of the four seasons so far – on par with the first and well ahead of the second and third season. The series takes place in the small town…

articles.title: Colossal pliosaur sea monster skull goes on display - BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: The skull of a colossal sea monster that was unearthed from the Jurassic Coast in the UK is going on display. The 2m-long fossil belongs to a pliosaur - one ...
